sources.description: List of data source entries, each with one modality and a multi-label origin classification.

Modality.description: The single data modality present (e.g., 'text', 'image', 'audio', 'video', etc.) based on the enum.

Human Generated.description: Set to true if the specified data with the modality mentioned is generated, captured, or derived manually by human.

Model Generated.description: Set to true if the specified data with the modality mentioned is generated by a model or an AI model.

Unknown Origin.description: Set to true if the specified data with the modality mentioned is not specified, not reported, or derived from web-crawl data with unclear provenance.

Reference.description: The location in the paper confirming the previous information provided (e.g., 'Section 1.1').

Reasoning.description: A justification based on the paper content explaining why the dataset is of modality mentioned, along with the reasoning of its origins.
